div.p: Stable isotope records of studied cores indicating changes in OSIW ventilation in relation to reference records. ( A) NGRIP ice core δ 18O time series ( 63). ( B) Kamchatka margin core 108 epibenthic δ 13C, indicating WSAP water inflow. ( C– E) Sakhalin margin cores epibenthic δ 13C, indicating changes in OSIW ventilation: ( C) core 78 from shallow N Sakhalin margin, ( D) core 4 from shallow middle Sakhalin margin, and ( E) core 79 from lower N Sakhalin margin, as labeled. ( F) Dongge Cave speleothem δ 18O time series, representing changes in Southeast Asian summer monsoon and links to North Atlantic climate ( 29). Colored background highlights the two different main ventilation phases from 0 to 6 ka (LH) and from 6 to 11 ka (EMH).
